name: YellowTale
description:
YellowTale is a BulletHell/RPG Game and was made with Monogame 3.6.

Controlls:

WASD -> Move

Left Click -> Shot

Right Click -> Dash

SHIFT ->  First Ability

Q -> Second Ability

E ->Third Ability (ULT)

OpenSource: https://github.com/jaemil/YellowTale

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCU-LFmdQ06MUIBCcDCgpcWQ

Twitter: https://twitter.com/jaemil_

Some Assets: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
